casebody.data:
No. 10-8717. Robert Earl Edwards, Petitioner v. T. R. Sniezek, Warden. 562 U.S. 1265, 131 S. Ct. 1586,

179 L. Ed. 2d 490,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 1813. February 28, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 400 Fed. Appx. 622.
